name: sos2324-15
description: Service Oriented Systems (Sistemas Orientados a Servicios) 2023/2024 at the [University of Sevilla](https://www.us.es) ====================

scripts.test-integration: (npx newman run ./test/integration/test-MFC.json -e ./test/integration/environments/gcloud2.json) && (npx newman run ./test/integration/test-OGG.json -e ./test/integration/environments/gcloud2.json) && (npx newman run ./test/integration/test-SCG.json -e ./test/integration/environments/gcloud2.json)
scripts.test: npm run test-integration && npm run test-e2e
